籤詩版本二:
An ce ba a ji ba, tufafi masu kyau da albashi mai kyau za su kai ga wadata
Kada ku tuna abin da ya faru a lokacin. Har yanzu kun yarda da ni.
詩意:
Wannan hexagram shine hoton yaro yana ganin mahaifiyarsa.
Sa'a ga dukkan mutane masu daraja.
解曰: An yi amfani da shi don bege. Kowa yana murna. Daga rundunar jama'a. Kamar dan yana saduwa da mahaifiyarsa.
籤詩故事一:
◇Dong Zhong yana neman dangi
Dong Zhong ɗan Dong Yong ne a daular Han, an haife shi ne ga wata aljana daga sama wadda ta zo duniya don ta auri Dong Yong. Daga baya, bayan aljana ya taimaka wa Dong Yong ya biya bashinsa kuma ya fanshi kansa, ya koma sama.
Dong Zhong, mai shekaru bakwai, ya sha wulakanci saboda ba shi da uwa, don haka ya so ya same ta.
A karkashin jagorancin Mr. Yi, Dong Zhong ya je tsaunin Taibai don neman ta a ranar 7 ga watan Yuli, aljana ta bayyana kuma a karshe ya ga mahaifiyarsa.
聖意: A gida ba ni da dadi, ni talaka ne, ina addu’ar Allah ya ba ni sa’a, a yi sa’a a kasuwanci, aure da aure, wata mata mai tafiya a kasa a Liujia ta toshe filin, tsutsotsin siliki suna cikin matsala, da wuya a samu mutane saboda asarar dabbobi, da wuya a shigar da kara, hijirar ra’ayin rikau ce, hasarar dukiya ta zama fanko, cututtuka suna addu’ar samun sa’a a tsaunuka da kaburbura.
